channel.title: Posts on Daisy的个人主页

item.title: Hello, World
item.description: I’ve wanted to build my own website since I was young. I’ve always been full of imagination and eager to explore new ideas. I needed a space — a little paradise — where I could record my thoughts, whether through writing, images, or videos. Thanks to technology, this dream is finally possible. It feels like a gift to my inner child.
